pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.1: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.2: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.1: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.2: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
